alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 11:14PM CDT until further notice by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Beaver River at Beaver affecting Beaver County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Forgan 8N. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the cimarron river in northern beaver county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 4.2 feet Wednesday evening. - Action stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
